Text.Page:
We set up a forward deep inside Azarel's Labyrinth. In retrospect, it was hubris to think we could sustain a camp that close to the enemy. Their last report told of enemy forces massing to attack.

Unfortunately, the camp's centurion has a copy of our battle plans. If those plans fall into enemy hands, we're doomed.

Take a group of reliable fighters to the Advance Camp in Azarel's Labyrinth Depths and destroy those plans.

Speed is of the essence, so go see {@LinkCreature:209#2000$$Tulutulu}. He can send you down to the Depths immediately.

In a hurry, eh? I can teleport you to Azarel's Labyrinth Depths instantly for a small fee.

No muss, no fuss. I highly recommend it. The long way can be treacherous.

(The centurion's body shows grievous wounds from a pitched battle.)

(Your search reveals a leather pouch secreted away beneath his armor, with the battle plans inside.)

(Hearing a sound nearby, you stuff the plans in your mouth, chew furiously, and swallow.)
